title: Dynamic Web Resource-Integrated Learning Design for Mathematical Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Simulation/VR environment dynamically providing web resources by topic using the Learning Activity Management System (LAMS), enabling project-based learning where professionals apply mathematical concepts to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can design math problem-solving activities using the LAMS platform and integrate dynamic web resources to create simulation environments.
Learners can solve real-world problems in professional fields (medical/legal/technical) using mathematical approaches by leveraging linked data resources in VR-based simulations.
Learners can present real-world applications of mathematical models through project deliverables and receive peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
